pageTitle: International speakers, thought leaders and a new digital partnership announced as part of World Public Relations Forum | Global Alliance for Public Relations and Communication Management
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {19342=Pre-sale registration for the World PR Forum is now available for GA association members until the 13 July, and with savings of up to $200 now is the time to register—don’t miss out!, 16790=Internationally renowned professionals, Professor Lee Chin-Chuan and Facebook’s Elizabeth Linder will join the already impressive line-up of speakers secured for this year’s World Public Relations Forum in Melbourne. Hot on the heels of this announcement is a new digital partnership with the world’s largest PR firm, Edelman. With pre-sale prices until 13 July, there has never been a better time to register!}
